p: Sequences from vertebrate viruses, and from mammalian viruses in particular, predominated. The principal viral families identified included the Bunyaviridae, Flaviviridae, Herpesviridae, Poxviridae, Reoviridae and Retroviridae, some of which were also found in previous bat virome studies [16], [18], [20]â€“ [22] ( Fig. 1B and 2B).
